description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Luffy rapidly throws multiple punches at high speed, creating the effect of a machine gun barrage.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy uses this technique to defeat multiple Sky Sharks that attack his group while traveling on the Milky Road.
